price: (1) O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ إِنَّ زَلۡزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَيۡءٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu ittaqū rabbakum inna zalzalata al-sāʿati shayon ʿaẓīmun
